data.eml:eml: Ctenocheloides boucheti n. sp., a new ghost shrimp from Papua New Guinea (Decapoda, Axiidea, Ctenochelidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Poore, Gary C. B. (2015): Ctenocheloides boucheti n. sp., a new ghost shrimp from Papua New Guinea (Decapoda, Axiidea, Ctenochelidae). Zootaxa 3955 (1): 142-146, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3955.1.10
